title: pollAda piLLai onrai peTra
sahitya:
pollAda piLLai onrai peTra yashOdai ellOrkkum mElAnAL nammai EreDuttum pArAdAnAL


anupallavi

  pullAnkuzhal Udi kanruDan ADi punnakai onru koNDE manattil iDam tEDi 
nillAdE kALiyan talai mEl ADi nIla vaNNak-kOlAhalan enra


caraNam    arangamillAdaravu paDamEri naTamADum Ayiram kaN pArkka giriyai kuDai nADum 
karam koL mUngilonrAl gAnamishaittADum karuttODu uriyEri veNNaik-kaLavADum
